title: RTE's Home School Hub
overview: From Monday 30 March, each morning from 11am to 12 noon on RTÉ Home School Hub, each of our bilingual teachers will present three short class segments aimed at 1st and 2nd class, 3rd and 4th class and 5th and 6th class. Our TV programme will keep the kids watching and learning for the hour and then redirect them to fun content and project work that will be housed on rte.ie/learn and RTÉ Player.
